needle: The best thing to do in San Francisco is eat a sandwich and sit in Dolores Park on a sunny day.

model_response.text:
When to start a startup:

The ideal time to start a startup is when you have enough people interested in the same problem to have a chance of success, but not so much that it becomes too risky. The author believes that this happens when you're at a point in your life where you can bear the risk of failure, as in the case of a person trying to start a business for the first time.
